title: Sunset Near Bar Harbor, Maine
medium:
Recto: Brush and oil on light brown paperboard
Verso: Graphite on light brown paperboard.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a sunset, with a waterfilled foreground separated by a barrier from a larger body of water in the middleground, whose shore begans a long ridge of tree-covered hills in the background.

Verso: A lizard, in opposite direction, show in profile, turned toward the left.
name: Drawing
